textTemplates.name: ApproverEmailParallel1
textTemplates.text:
Hello,

Your queue has been assigned the following request: #{!$Record.CaseNumber}

  • Property Name : {!$Record.RETL_SR_Property_Name__c}
  • SR Category : {!$Record.RETL_SR_Category__c}
  • SR Service Type : {!$Record.RETL_SR_Service_Type__c}
  • Assigned Queue : {!Fetch_Parallel_Step_1_Approver.Outputs.Approver}

To view the record being approved, go to this record and then approve or reject the request in the Work Guide.

If the approval request isn't available in the Work Guide, someone else in your queue completed it.


Thank you

Salesforce
